special_powers.name: MULTI-DIAL CHARACTERS (GALACTUS)
special_powers.description: When the G001a dial would be "KO'd", instead Galactus continues on click #1 of the G001b dial. Excess damage does not carry over. When Galactus is healed, he can't be healed above click #1 of the G001b dial (ie, back onto the G001a dial).

special_powers.name: PLACEMENT WHEN STARTING THE GAME
special_powers.description: When Galactus is placed during game set-up or starts the game when summoned by the Herald Dial, he: * can't be placed on special terrain. * can't be placed in an opponent's starting area (when summoned by the Herald Dial). * can be placed on blocking terrain and immediately destroys that terrain when doing so.

special_powers.name: COSMIC ENTITY
special_powers.description: Galactus can't be the target of an attack with more than one target.

special_powers.name: GALACTUS HAS LANDED ON EARTH!
special_powers.description: POWER: Place Galactus anywhere on the map except an opponent's starting area or on special terrain. He can be placed on blocking terrain and immediately destroys that terrain when doing so.

special_powers.name: BECAUSE I AM GALACTUS!!!
special_powers.description: STOP. Impervious, Regeneration. Galactus can reduce penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: PLACEMENT WHEN STARTING THE GAME
special_powers.description: When Galactus is placed during game set-up or starts the game when summoned by the Herald Dial, he: * can't be placed on special terrain. * can't be placed in an opponent's starting area (when summoned by the Herald Dial). * can be placed on blocking terrain and immediately destroys that terrain when doing so.

special_powers.name: COSMIC ENTITY
special_powers.description: Galactus can't be the target of an attack with more than one target.

special_powers.name: GALACTUS HAS LANDED ON EARTH!
special_powers.description: POWER: Place Galactus anywhere on the map except an opponent's starting area or on special terrain. He can be placed on blocking terrain and immediately destroys that terrain when doing so.

special_powers.name: BECAUSE I AM GALACTUS!!!
special_powers.description: STOP. Impervious, Regeneration. Galactus can reduce penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: SENTINEL CREATION
special_powers.description: POWER: Generate any number of characters with the Sentinel and Robot keywords not named Master Mold whose total points are equal to or less than the point total shown on the Factory dial, then turn the Factory Dial to click #1 and Master Mold gains Immobile until the end of your next turn.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: AWAKEN THE SENTINELS
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked or damaged Master Mold since your last turn. Place another friendly character with the Sentinel and Robot keywords such that it can make a close attack targeting the chosen character, then do so.

special_powers.name: OUR MISSION REMAINS UNFINISHED
special_powers.description: STOP. Mastermind, Regeneration, Toughness.

special_powers.name: STOKING MUTANT HYSTERIA: SENTINELS ARE INEVITABLE
special_powers.description: Leadership, Outwit. When Master Mold uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, you may generate a WizKids MP20-B001 or a MP20-B002 Sentinel bystander -or- click the Factory Dial once.

special_powers.name: BABYSITTER FROM HELL
special_powers.description: When a character within 4 squares is damaged by an attack not made by Ghost Rider, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 4-6: Move Ghost Rider up to 4 squares.

special_powers.name: COSMIC PENANCE
special_powers.description: When an opposing character attacks a friendly character, after resolutions give the attacker a Penance token. // POWER: Make an attack targeting a single opposing character. Before making the attack roll, you may remove up to 3 Penance tokens from the target. Modify attack and damage +1 for each Penance token removed. If the attack hits, after resolutions heal Ghost Rider equal to the number of Penance tokens removed.

special_powers.name: HERALD OF THANOS AND THE BIG GUY
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection, Impervious.

special_powers.name: MY FATHER'S LEGACY CONTINUED
special_powers.description: Colossal Stamina. When Thanos KO's a character, after resolutions heal him 1 click and remove one of his action tokens.

special_powers.name: SUBMIT TO PUNISHMENT
special_powers.description: Probability Control. // FREE: Choose an opposing character within range and line of fire and give them the Punishment token (maximum 1). // The character with the Punishment token can't use Probability Control and attacks they make or targeting them can't be rerolled except by Thanos's Probability Control. When Thanos deals damage to that character, after resolutions remove the Punishment token.

special_powers.name: PENI PARKER, PSYCHOGENETIC PILOT
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per game, generate a Peni Parker bystander. // When SP//dr is KO'd, if you haven't generated a Peni Parker bystander this game, you may generate one in SP//dr's square.

special_powers.name: CALL IN HELP FROM THE SPIDER-VERSE!
special_powers.description: When SP//dr hits an opposing character, if not character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Place another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword adjacent.

special_powers.name: WEB-TRAP MODIFICATIONS
special_powers.description: FREE: If SP//dr hasn't been moved or placed this turn, make a range attack with a range of 4. Instead of normal damage, choose one: *Give a hit target an action token. *Until your next turn, a hit target has Immobile. *After resolutions, place SP//dr adjacent to a hit target.

special_powers.name: I'M A 14-YEAR OLD VEGETARIAN GENIUS AND READY TO FIGHT
special_powers.description: Perplex, Empower.

special_powers.name: PILING UP CONTINUTIY TOKENS
special_powers.description: Probability Control. Deadpool the Duck has PROTECTED: Opposing Probability Control. When Deadpool the Duck makes an attack, after resolutions give him a Continuity token (Max 2). // Once per turn during an attack, if he has line of fire to the attacker, you may remove a Continuity token to change the result of a d6 roll (including one die of an attack roll) to a 2 or a 5.

special_powers.name: SO LONG, SUCKERS!
special_powers.description: Regeneration. You may remove a Continuity token to change the result of his d6 roll for Regeneration to a 5.

special_powers.name: ODIN'S CLOSE CONFIDANT
special_powers.description: FREE: If Lady Phoenix is adjacent to a friendly character named Odin, heal both characters 1 click.

special_powers.name: BEFORE LIFE DOMINATED THE COSMOS
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 3 squares can't use Willpower.

special_powers.name: ANCIENT INCARNATION: PHOENIX
special_powers.description: When another character named Phoenix, Dark Phoenix, or Jean Grey hits, after resolutions remove an action token from this character.

special_powers.name: POWER ENOUGH TO MELT SUPERNOVAS
special_powers.description: Pulse Wave. When Lady Phoenix use it to target more than one character, she deals her printed damage instead.

special_powers.name: MY EYESIGHT ISN'T WHAT IT USED TO BE
special_powers.description: Old Man Hawkeye's range value is his printed speed value.

special_powers.name: THE LONGEST ROAD TRIP
special_powers.description: Once per game, if a friendly character that can use this trait is KO'd in an opponent's starting area, you take an extra turn after your next turn.

special_powers.name: ONE IN A MILLION SHOT
special_powers.description: POWER: Once per game, make a range attack targeting a single opposing character. If it hits (before dealing damage) choose a standard power. The hit character can't use the chosen power this game.

special_powers.name: RAID THE ARMORY
special_powers.description: During force construction, add an equipment of 10 points or less to your force without paying its cost. Punisher starts the game equipped with it. (This doesn't count as one of your placed objects.)

special_powers.name: BLACK OPS TECH
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose one, but you may choose each only once per game. Tiny damage symbol -or- Energy Shield/Deflection -or- Force Blast as FREE -or- Blades/Claws/Fangs. The chosen effect lasts until your next turn.

special_powers.name: GONNA TRY THE LITTLE ONE
special_powers.description: Pulse Wave. When Punisher uses it, after resolutions you may knock back any number of hit characters 3 squares.

special_powers.name: FASTER, BETTER, MORE ARROGANT, TAKE YOUR PICK
special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed. Quicksilver's attacks deal a maximum of 3 damage. When Quicksilver uses Hypersonic Speed and makes a close attack, after the attack resolves (before moving again), he may make a close attack targeting a character he hasn't attacked this action.

special_powers.name: THE MOST AGGRAVATING TEAMMATE
special_powers.description: Perplex. When Quicksilver uses it to target another friendly character that shares a keyword, instead roll 3d6 and the resulting combat value(s) are modified +1 (until your next turn) for each result. 1: Range, 2: Speed, 3: Attack, 4: Defense, 5: Damage, 6: Your choice. If he rolls three 6's this way, remove all tokens from him and the target character and heal them each 3 clicks.

special_powers.name: MY SCARLET SENSES
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection. Super Senses, but succeeds on a 4-6.

special_powers.name: BAD LUCK HEXES
special_powers.description: Probability Control. For all characters with this power, if an opposing character's attack roll was re-rolled or a die in it was replaced, the final result is decreased by -1.

name: Pixie
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: TELEPORTATION SPELL
special_powers.description: Phasing/Teleport. Passenger: 3. When Pixie carries, carried characters that share a keyword with her may be placed within 3 squares instead of adjacent.

special_powers.name: I THINK THEY SEE TEDDY BEARS AND UNICORNS
special_powers.description: Smoke Cloud. Opposing characters occupying markers generated by this power can use Earthbound/Neutralized and Battle Fury.

special_powers.name: A MIX OF MUTATION AND MAGIC
special_powers.description: When Pixie rolls a single d6 increase the result by +1, maximum of 6.

special_powers.name: CAMOUFLAGE
special_powers.description: Stealth. If Spider-Man is adjacent to a piece of blocking terrain or a square of higher elevation, opposing characters can't draw lines of fire to him.

special_powers.name: HEY, WATCH WHERE YOU POINT THAT THING!
special_powers.description: Incapacitate, Precision Strike, Quake. // When an opposing character misses Spider-Man with an attack, after resolutions give the attacker an action token.

special_powers.name: LET ME GO FIRST
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may turn Power Man & Iron Fist's dial to the same click # of another color. If you do and turn to a: 1) Red click #, generate an Iron Fist bystander and KO any Power Man bystander (generated by this character). 2) Green click #, generate a Power Man bystander and KO any Iron Fist bystander (generated by this character).

special_powers.name: TRYING TO JUST HAVE A NORMAL LIFE AFTER JAIL
special_powers.description: Unless Ghost-Spider is the only character on your force, she may only attack opposing characters that have made attacks since your last turn.

special_powers.name: HOW 'BOUT PUTTING DOWN THE GUNS AND WALKING AWAY?
special_powers.description: Leap/Climb. When Ghost-Spider uses it, after resolutions you may make a close attack.
